attributes.action: Introduce criminal offence of travelling with intent to trophy hunt.
attributes.background: Trophy hunting is the killing of carefully selected animals, for pleasure. Frequently, this is big game such as lions, giraffes and elephants. It is a cruel and barbaric practice that has no place in a civilised society. The UK must take an ethical stance and set an example to the rest of the world.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for criminalising trophy hunting in other countries. 

You could start a new petition asking to ban the import of wild animal trophies into the UK if that's something you'd like to see happen.
